How do I pay with Google Pay?

Hey bunqers 

Excited to start using [Google Pay](https://together.bunq.com/d/8480)? You can easily use Google Pay to pay online and in physical stores too. Not sure how? Just click on the type of payment you want to make and check out the flow ✅

**Haven’t set up Google Pay? You can find out how to set it up [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/8480-what-is-google-pay-and-how-do-i-enable-it/2).**

*Keep in mind that you can only use Google Pay if you reside in the Netherlands, Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Portugal, Spain, and the UK.*

-----

## How to use Google Pay in physical stores

- Make sure the terminal supports contactless payments.
- Unlock your device (unless the amount is below €25).
- Hold your device against the terminal. Done!

Check out how it works [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z5M5n8ZOBfg).

Please keep in mind that the NFC function on your phone needs to be switched on to use Google Pay. You also need to change the NFC settings if you’ve used Tap&Pay in the past. You can do this from your phone's Settings, then follow these steps:
1. Tap Apps & Notifications and then Default apps
2. Your Default apps might be under Advanced
3. Select Tap & Pay
4. Set Google Pay as the default app
5. Done 

----

## How to use Google Pay online

- Select ‘buy with Google Pay’ when you’re in the checkout of the webshop.
- Select the card you want to pay with.
- Click continue. If there is no card yet at the checkout, you can add one and it will appear when you use Google Pay next time.
- Confirm your purchase.

Check out how it works [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yl5SGXiPnDY).

What is the limit for a Sofort top up?

Hey bunqers  

If you’re here you may have tried to top up using SOFORT and are now receiving an error that you have reached your daily limit when no top up was completed like the one below.

### Why was this happening?

In most cases, this error may have appeared because you initiated a Sofort top up but didn’t complete it ‍♂️

Sofort tells us when a top up is initiated but does not tell us when it wasn’t completed, so the transaction counts towards the €250 daily limit even though it wasn’t completed.

In other cases, it would appear because you did top up and reached your €250 daily limit. 

## How can I prevent this from happening?

When you want to do a Sofort top up, make sure that you complete the transaction in the same session you initiate it in to prevent receiving this message. 

## My top up limit has been reached, what now?

If you have reached your daily top up limit, we advise you to wait 2  working days, or check out [this topic](https://together.bunq.com/d/2933-how-do-i-deposit-money-or-transfer-funds-to-my-bunq-account) for some advice on other ways you can top up your bunq account.

 Wat is Beslaglegging?



Als je schulden hebt, kan het zijn dat er beslag wordt gelegd op het geld op je rekening.

Een rechter kan bepalen dat het geld op je rekening gebruikt moet worden om je schuld af te lossen. bunq is dan verplicht hieraan gehoor te geven door middel van een beslagleggingsprocedure. Deze worden opgelegd door de deurwaarder, dus niet door onszelf.
_____________
## Beslaglegging
Wanneer we beslag leggen op je tegoeden, gebeurt dit nadat de schuldeiser deze procedure bij de autoriteiten in gang heeft gezet. Je tegoeden worden dan overgemaakt naar een interne rekening. Op deze rekening wordt je geld voor de deurwaarder gereserveerd. Hierna krijg je weer volledige toegang tot je bunq account.
____________________
## Verklaring
Wettelijk zijn we verplicht om na de beslaglegging 4 weken te wachten. Hierna laten we de deurwaarder weten hoeveel geld er op je rekening stond ten tijde van de beslaglegging.
_________________
## Overboeking
Na het ontvangen van deze verklaring laat de deurwaarder ons weten hoeveel geld er verschuldigd is: dit bedrag maken we dan over naar de deurwaarder. De deurwaarder stuurt dit geld vervolgens door naar de schuldeiser, waarmee de beslagleggingsprocedure is afgerond.

___________________

Moet je geld nog worden vrijgegeven nadat de termijn van de beslaglegging is verstreken? Laat het ons dan weten op support@bunq.com
Als je bezwaar wil maken tegen deze procedure of het gebruik ervan, dan kan je dit eveneens kenbaar maken bij je plaatselijke deurwaarder.

_____________

 Phishing Betrug: Was ist es und wie kann ich es vermeiden?

## Phishing Betrug: Was ist es und wie kann ich es vermeiden?

Wir wurden darauf aufmerksam  gemacht, dass es laufende Phishing-Betrügereien gibt, die vorgeben bunq oder andere Banken zu sein, und von dir verlangen deine Bankdetails zu verifizieren, damit sie diese dann stehlen können. Wir wollten das Thema ansprechen und dir weitere Informationen und Ratschläge geben, um zu vermeiden, dass du ein Betrugsopfer wirst.

## Was ist Phishing? 
Phishing ist eine Art von Betrug, wo der Betrüger Nachrichten (Emails, Texte, Nachrichten über den sozialen Netzwerke) sendet und dabei vorgibt ein bekanntes Unternehmen zu repräsentieren. Er nutzt diese Nachrichten dann, um dir persönliche Daten wie Kennwörter, Kontodetails und Kartennummern zu stehlen.

## Wie benutzen diese Betrüger bunq?

Phishing ist unter unterschiedlichen Formen zu finden. Eine davon wären die SMS Nachrichten oder Emails, die vorgeben von uns zu sein und dir mitteilen, dass etwas mit deinem Konto nicht in Ordnung ist, und du deinen Benutzernamen und dein Kennwort nochmal verifizieren solltest. Alternativ kann es sich auch um eine SMS oder Email von einem Unternehmen handeln, die dir mitteilt dass du noch eine bestimmte “Gebühr” zu bezahlen hast. 

## Wie könnte ich es vermeiden Phishing-Opfer zu werden? ‍♂️

- **Gib niemals deine Anmeldedaten oder persönliche Informationen raus**
Bunq würde niemals nach persönlichen Daten außerhalb der App fragen und falls jemand vorgibt wir zu sein und diese Information von dir verlangt, ist es ein Betrug und du solltest auf keinen Fall persönliche Daten rausgeben.

- **Überprüf das Format und Rechtschreibung der Nachrichten** 
Falls das Format und Rechtschreibung zu der geschäftlichen Webadresse, woher es stammen sollte, nicht passt, ist es höchstwahrscheinlich ein Betrug.

- **Pass auf gefälschte Webseiten auf**
Sei immer sicher, dass du auf bunq.app bist, wenn du deine Anmeldedaten eingibst.
 
- **Nimm Kontakt mit uns via offiziellen Kanäle auf**
Falls du eine Mail von einer Quelle bekommst, die du erkennst (z.B. bunq ) aber es scheint etwas merkwürdig oder nicht ganz okay zu sein mit der Nachricht, kontaktiere uns nochmal separat, um zu bestätigen, dass die Nachricht authentisch ist. Das hilft uns neue Betrugsmaschen zu identifizieren.

## Sei mit deinen Sozial Media Posts vorsichtig
Wenn du Sachen auf den sozialen Netzwerken teilst, sei mit deinen persönlichen Daten wie Geburtsdatum, Urlaubsplänen, Adresse, Handynummer usw. vorsichtig, da diese Informationen für die Betrüger oft nützlich sein könnten.

## Muss du etwas melden? 
Falls es um einen betrügerischen Benutzer geht, kannst du uns helfen bunq sicher zu halten. Fülle einfach dieses Formular aus und wir übernehmen es von hier an. Falls du einen betrügerischen Benutzer meldest, schließe bitte seine Kontonummer und jegliche relevante Informationen in deiner Nachricht mit ein.

## Was ist zu tun, wenn du einen bunq.me Link nicht vertraust?
Falls du einen bunq.me Link bekommen hast und Betrug vermutest tippe bitte auf den Report Button, um den Fall bei unserem Compliance Team zu melden. Das Team Ergreift in diesem Fall sofort Maßnahmen

____

## Möchtest du mehr erfahren?
Du kannst dir gerne unsere bunq Wissensdatenbank unter https://go.bunq.com/link/knowledge anschauen. 

What are the limits for contactless payments?



Contactless payments have become increasingly popular due to their convenience and speed. However, to ensure security and prevent potential misuse, we've set certain limits for these transactions.

How do I auto-accept direct debits?

Hey bunqers  

For optimum control, we always make sure that you authorize a payment before it’s done. From now on, you never have to manually approve payments to your favorite online stores or to your best friends. You can simply enable Auto Accept and automatically approve all future payments to your selected list. 

You can auto accept your direct debits too, just follow the simple process mentioned bellow.

1. Go to  Profile 
2. Tap on ⚙️
3. Tap on "Security"
4. Scroll down to "Auto Accept"
5. Select "Direct Debits"
6. Choose a payment of the Direct Debit you want to add
7. Set the Auto Accept limit 
8. All set ✨

## How can I auto-accept payments on bunq Web?

1. Go to https://web.bunq.com
2. Click on Profile
3. Click on ⚙️
4. Click on "Direct Debits" under the "Auto Accepted" tab
5.  + Add Direct Debit
6. Add the Direct Debit you want
7. Set the payment limit 
8. All set ✅

## How can I disable the auto-accept?

1. Go to  Profile
2. Tap on ⚙️ Settings
3. Tap on "Security"
4. Click on "Direct Debits" under the "Auto Accepted" tab
5. Select the direct debit you want to remove
6. Tap on "Stop Auto Accept”

I entered the wrong PIN too many times. How do I unblock my card?

Hey bunqers  

Accidentally forgot your PIN and entered the wrong code too many times? 

Not to worry as you can reset your PIN via the app! Once you have done so, your card will be unblocked and you can use it again straight away 

### What should I do?

[Click here](https://go.bunq.com/link/set-pin) or check out the steps below to choose a new PIN and reactivate your card:

1. **Open** bunq app
2. Go to **Home** tab
3. Tap on **Cards**
4. **Select** the card in question
5. Tap on **More** and/or select **Change PIN**
6. Choose a new pin code and **confirm**

After completing the steps above, we recommend making an ATM transaction to ensure that the PIN stored on the chip of your card is updated too.

## I entered the PIN correctly but still got an error, what do I do? 

Before using, the PIN needs to have synced to the Card Chip (using in store where you need to enter a PIN and/or ATM withdrawal), otherwise you can get 'Invalid PIN' errors even if the PIN entered is correct. 

This is usually because the terminal is offline and the PIN you've chosen when activating your card isn't on the card chip yet, until an online transaction is completed and we can push the PIN to the card. Therefore the card has a random PIN that was assigned when the card was ordered.

What is passive income?

Hey bunqers  

Passive income is income received on a regular basis, with little or no effort required to maintain it. Rent, interest, royalties or dividends are examples of passive income. Usually this type of income is earned next to the revenues from the main activities of a company, but in some cases the main income source is passive income. If you’re not sure whether your company earns passive income, contact your tax consultant or accountant.

### What does the passive income include?

Passive income includes: interest, rental income, royalties and dividends from third parties (unless the dividends are through management fees, salaries and sales as part of your holding company). Keep in mind that bunq supports 100% passive income!

If your holding or the company managed by the holding has passive income, you should fill in [this form](https://assets-global.website-files.com/63b43f001c7774d38d5f3a2d/63ed0976de7e35355825d2ca_FATCA_CRS_self-certification_form_.pdf) and provide us with it. 

## Did you just get a notification in the app asking for more information?

Information events are the fastest way to save time when opening a bunq account! They serve as direct options for you to provide documents or information directly to us through your app. 
To find the events in the app, just follow the steps below:

1. Go to **Profile** tab
2. Tap on **Events awaiting**
3. Select **Business information**  and tap on **Awaiting business information**

When you get a notification in the app, you can provide the additional information and expected passive income percentage (if you have any) directly to us! 


## Why did I receive a notification to provide more information? 

We are asking these questions because not all types of business activities are within our acceptance policy and we want to better understand what you are doing. This is in order to prevent possible unwanted restrictions on your account at a later point.  To do that, we aim to gather as much accurate and elaborate information as possible at the very start of your journey with bunq. 

Pro Tips for bunq Freelancers - Taxes made easy

We know that freelancing takes some serious skills, passion and time. That’s why we want to make life easy and provide you with all of the helpful tools needed to be successful.
Here are some of our pro tips on how to bank like a true professional 

---

## Automate your VAT 

Leave the boring jobs to the machines and focus on doing what you love - growing your business. Did you know VAT can be automated at bunq? Yes, VAT is as easy as 1,2,3. Just set up Auto VAT in your bunq app and always know the exact amount of VAT you owe! You can learn how to set up your Auto VAT right away [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/14717). 

---

## Keep 30% of your income, for taxes 

Of course, income tax obligations differ from business to business. As a freelancer, everything you earn from the services you provide is gross and you must pay income taxes for it. A general way to ensure you have enough money for taxes is to reserve 30% of your business income. With bunq, you can set aside this amount into a separate Bank Account so you have a better overview of your income after tax!

* For our Dutch freelancers 

Take advantage of your allowances. Make the most of time spent on your business. Once you work more than 1225 hours in a year  for your company (~24h a week), it's possible to receive a tax allowance of up to 46%! In addition, if your turnover does not exceed €20,000 per year, you are exempt from VAT. You can find more information about these and more allowances [here](https://business.gov.nl/subsidy/entrepreneurs-allowance/)

* For our German freelancers 

Take advantage of lower income taxes. Money is an important factor to growing your business. That's why the German government taxes your profits rather than your revenue. You can add up a couple of things as business costs, like rent, internet or travel equipment. The higher your business costs, the lower the net income and tax you will be paying. In addition, if you make less than €22,000 in your first year and less than €50,000 in your second year, you are considered a small business and do not need to charge VAT to your clients! Make sure you keep track of all the receipts with Receipt Scanner and claim your tax deductions effortlessly.

What is SOFORT?

Hey bunqers  

SOFORT is an Online Banking ePayment method, not unlike iDEAL. Where iDEAL is reserved for Dutch bank account owners, SOFORT is available for users who have a bank account in other European countries. 

### In which countries is SOFORT available?

- Austria
- Belgium
- Germany
- Italy
- Netherlands
- Spain

## When can SOFORT deposits be used?

- As an alternative to iDEAL for topping up your balance
- To pay bunq.me requests 

*Small note: The minimum amount of cash you can deposit with SOFORT is €0,10. All transactions that are lower will be refused by SOFORT.*

## What is the daily limit for SOFORT transfer?

- bunq Personal: €250 in total
- bunq Business: €500 in total 

---

Because of extra risks involved, bunq.me payments with SOFORT are not instantly transferred to the receiving bunq account. The payment comes in as soon as we receive it from SOFORT with a normal SCT cycle. A SOFORT deposit to top up your own bunq account will be available for you instantly! 

Looking to pay with SOFORT in a web shop? Check out [this link](https://together.bunq.com/d/5676-how-do-i-pay-with-sofort-in-a-web-shop) to see how.

**Update: We've blocked SOFORT deposits coming in from Keytrade, KBC (Belgium), HypoVereinsbank (Germany), Deutsche Bank (Spain) and Banca Sella (Italy) because they were not providing the name of the accountholder with the transfer. Please note some N26 users experience difficulties regularly trying to top up via SOFORT. To avoid unnecessary waiting time, we recommend you to transfer from your N26 to your bunq account using a regular SEPA transfer.**

---

## Good to know

- If you've a 'pending' Sofort transaction still open, this one also counts towards your daily Sofort limit as it might still get completed 
- If you receive an error message "Transaction not allowed", the request expires almost immediately. We'd suggest using a different payment method to complete the payment, for example via a regular bank transfer
- Not completed attempts to top up with Sofort expire after 30 minutes
- We give you the money from the Sofort top-up payments right away and then we receive the money from the other bank later. Once received we reset the Sofort limit. It takes 2 business days for the limit to be reset and only then you can use Sofort to top-up again
- All incoming Sofort transactions contribute to the limit
- When you create a bunq.me request and the other party settles the request using Sofort, this counts towards your full limit of €250.00 (eg. request for €10 settled with Sofort will allow the user to only top-up with €240.00 or less)
- This limit can also result in a request not being payable with Sofort. 
eg. You create a Shared Request for €10.00 and send it to a group of friends. You then top-up your account with €250.00 using Sofort. Your friends will get an error when they try to settle the request using Sofort (Sofort not available for this request). If they try again the next day, they'll be able to settle the request using Sofort again.

### How do I accept SEPA B2B Direct Debits?

Normally, accepting a business to business direct debit requires you to send a signed form to your bank and, after acceptance, it cannot be easily changed. Upon accepting the mandate you’ll accept all future direct debits from that party and the limit is automatically set based on the original amount. You can always change the limit of both the mandate and your bank account at any time.

1. Home
2. Tap on Events
3. Select the awaiting event
4. You can choose between Always accepting this Direct debit or to Accept only this direct debit
5. Enter your security code
6. Done 

 Utiliser bunq en France



bunq est disponible dans tous les pays membres de l’espace économique européen (EEE) ce qui en fait une banque internationale. Cependant, tous les pays n'ont pas les mêmes habitudes bancaires. C’est pourquoi nous aimerions partager quelques conseils avec nos utilisateurs vivant en France, un pays plein de culture, de beaux paysages et de nourriture incroyable.  縷

---

## Connaître votre IBAN
En frayant notre chemin dans l’océan de banques traditionnelles, nous avons eu la chance d'acquérir un permis bancaire: un permis bancaire néerlandais, pour être précis. Cela signifie que lorsque vous ouvrez un compte chez bunq, ce dernier aura un IBAN néerlandais qui est tout à fait approprié pour être utilisé dans tout l'EEE (Espace économique européen). Alors ne vous inquiétez pas, vous pouvez très bien payer vos factures avec votre compte bunq.

Example d’IBAN bunq: NLXXBUNQXXXXXXXXXX

Si vous vous retrouvez dans une situation où votre IBAN est rejeté en raison de sa provenance néerlandaise, vérifiez s'il s’agit d’une [discrimination d’IBAN](https://together.bunq.com/d/23003)

---

## RIB? J’aime seulement les “ribs” en barbecue 肋
RIB est l'abréviation de relevé d’identité bancaire. Certaines entités peuvent vous demander de fournir un RIB pour prouver la propriété de votre IBAN. Pour vous assurer que votre compte bunq peut être utilisé sans aucune limitation, nous avons introduit une fonctionnalité qui vous permet de l’obtenir en quelques secondes. Il vous faut simplement changer  la langue de votre appareil mobile en français et suivre les étapes présentées [ici](https://together.bunq.com/d/5375).

---

## Chèques
En tant que banque en ligne, bunq n'a pas de divisions locales. Cela signifie que les méthodes disponibles pour déposer votre argent sur un compte bunq sont entièrement numérisées. Actuellement, nos utilisateurs se servent principalement de Klarna (SOFORT), iDeal, virements bancaires ou cartes de crédit / débit pour recharger leurs comptes, bien que certains d'entre eux préfèrent encore un chèque physique. Notre application ne prend cependant en charges que des méthodes entièrement automatisées et éco-friendly. Moins de chèques, moins de papier, moins d'arbres endommagés.  
Si vous avez un chèque qui doit être encaissé, nous vous conseillons de rechercher si une entreprise locale tierce permet de transférer le montant du chèque en question aux détails de l'IBAN.

---

## Numéro fiscal
En tant que banque, nous sommes dans l’obligation légale d’effectuer quelques contrôles lors du processus d’inscription. Nous devons par exemple vous demander de fournir votre NIF (Numéro d'identification fiscale). Pour aider nos utilisateurs expatriés et mineurs, nous accordons cependant une période de 3 mois pour le transmettre! Si vous créez un compte pour votre enfant, le NIF de votre enfant peut être connecté au vôtre jusqu'à ce qu'il devienne majeur.

How do Group Expenses work?

Hey bunqers 

Automatically track and easily split expenses with a group of friends ✨ Splitting the bill after an awesome day of having fun together with your friends? Use Group Expenses so you can focus on the good times without worrying about how to split the bill!

### How to track and split expenses automatically?

1. Go to the Activities tab
2.  Scroll down
3.  Click on “Auto-Track Group Expenses”
4. Choose a name for your activity and select the participants you want to share the activity with. 
5. Personalize the Group Expense by choosing your own background and icon and typing in a description.
6. Set a beginning and end date
7. Choose if you want to add Auto Add Card Payments 

---

 **“Auto Add Card Payments” ON** = All your card payments will automatically be added to the group expense and split with the participants. Set an end date so the automatically added payments can stop at the end of your trip! Invitees can also edit the Auto Add Card Payments option from the Group Expense’s settings.

 **“Auto Add Card Payments” OFF** = Your card payments won’t be automatically added but you can still add expenses manually or from your past payments. 

---

When your activity is over you’ll be able to settle expenses with your friends - easy as that.

## How to add an expense from past payments?

1. Go to the Activities Tab
2. Scroll down 
3. Tap on the Group Expense tile 
4. Tap on “Add expense” 
5. Select the payment you want to add 
6. Use the  Search bar and filters to find a payment

## How to add a group expense manually?

1. Go to the Activities Tab 
2. Scroll down 
3. Tap on the Group Expense tile 
4. Tap on “Add expense” 
5. Tap on “Add manually” 
6. Add a description, select the person who paid it and how it should be split among the group
7. Tap “Add Expense”

## How do I edit a payment from a Group Expense?

1. Go to the Activity tab 
2. Tap on the Group Expense
3. Select the desired expense
4. Tap on  Edit Expense and edit it accordingly
5. Tap on Save
6. Done 

## How do I remove a payment from a Group Expense?

1. Go to the Activities tab
2. Scroll down and tap on the Group Expense tile.
3. Find the payment you want to remove
4. Swipe left on the payment
5. Remove

## How can I remove several expenses at once?

1. Tap and hold the icon of a payment to select it
2.  Select all the payments you want to remove
3.  Tap “Remove” at the bottom of the screen

## How do I close a Group Expense?

1. Go to Activities Tab
2. Scroll down and tap the group expense you want to close
3. Tap "Stop Group Expense" at the bottom of the screen

**Note:** Pending payment requests will be shown in the relevant Group Expense. 

## Can I see which payment is part of the Group Expense from my Bank Account?

Yes, you can ✨ There will be a visual indicator on each payment that’s part of your active Group Expense.


## Good to know

- You can be an active member of multiple active Group Expenses, however you can automatically add payments for only one active Group Expense at a time.
- If you’ve turned on “Auto Add Card Payments” for a Group Expense and you want to start auto adding in another one - you’ll get a screen giving you the option to either continue your current auto adding or proceed with the new one and end the current active Group Expense.
- When someone adds you to a Group Expense, you're automatically an active member.
- Group Expenses can be created in any currency! This means that you can view your expenses in any of the local currencies we support. 
- Each person from the Group Expenses group can review a place once per 12 hours.
 
When the time has come to settle the Group Expense, payment requests will be sent in the currency most comfortable for the receiving person, based on the Bank Account they own. For example, if you create a Group Expense in USD and you have a USD Bank Account, you'll receive your funds in USD.

However if you own only a EUR Bank Account you can still view your Group Expense in USD but you'll receive what you're owed converted automatically into EUR."

What does the Expired status mean?

Hey bunqers  

In this topic, we'll clarify what the "Expired" status indicates, when you might encounter it, and what actions you might need to take. As always, we're here to make your banking experience as clear and straightforward as possible 

### What does this status mean?

- **For outgoing card payments**

For outgoing card payments, this status means that the funds have left your account successfully, however the merchant has failed to collect the payment from your account within 30 days. This means that the funds will be returned to your account. 

In the Bank Account’s payment history you can see both statuses of the expired payment - when it left your account successfully and when it was returned to you. 

- **For incoming card refunds**

For incoming card refunds, this status means that the merchant has initiated a refund to your bank account. However, the merchant failed to send the funds and complete the refund within 30 days. Therefore the payment status changes to “Expired”. 

In the Bank Account’s payment history you can see both statuses of the expired refund - when it was initially requested by the merchant and when it expires.

Who can open a bunq Business account in Portugal 

Hey bunqers  

Your safety and well-being are our priority. We have an acceptance policy in place to abide by legal regulations and follow some of our own risk standards as a company.

After you complete the sign-up process in 5 minutes, we'll quickly review your application. We assess each application individually to make sure every company is held to the same standard and fulfils all requirements.

Wondering if you can sign up for a business account? Check out the requirements for opening an account below:

### Who can open an account?

Here are the basic conditions you need to meet in order to open a bunq business account:

- You need to have a verified personal account with bunq.
- You as a director cannot be a minor.
- You need to run a legitimate business in Portugal 
- You need to be permanently residing in Portugal 
- Your business should operate under one of the legal forms currently accepted by bunq. Find the full list [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/9256).
- Your company’s corporate structure and activities should comply with bunq’s requirements. More details on this below.
- Your business entity cannot have more than one account with bunq.
- If your company has multiple trade names (under the same registration on the Chamber of Commerce) - you can effortlessly open a Bank Account with the different names like we explain [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/24341-trade-names-for-your-business-bank-accounts).
- If the various layers of your company are registered as separate legal entities with the Chamber of Commerce (Câmaras de Comércio), each one would need its own Business accounts.

Once we confirm the above-mentioned conditions are met, we need to determine whether your business entity is registered with the local Chamber of Commerce or, in specific situations, you are operating on a freelance basis. Depending on that, we require different documents in order to approve your account.

**Important:** As a bank, we are legally required to store all of our user’s personal information in a secure and protected way. If there is more than one director,  we create Personal accounts for each director of the business accounts. It allows us to keep your information and your company’s information safe while complying with regulations. Check out [this topic](https://together.bunq.com/d/38241) for more information.

## Legal forms and documents

In order to open a business account with bunq, you need to provide a legal form together with a few documents. We accept the following legal forms.

- Empresário em nome individual
- Estabelecimento Individual de Responsabilidade Limitada

For each legal form, we require the following documents.

- Empresário em nome individual
 - Chamber of Commerce (CoC) excerpt
- Estabelecimento Individual de Responsabilidade Limitada
 - Deed of Incorporation (DOI)
 - Joint Authorisation if the company has more than one director
 - CoC excerpt
 - IDs of all directors and Ultimate Beneficial Owners (UBOs)

Please find more information on legal documents [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/24017).

## Company activities

In accordance with our acceptance policy, we do not support all types of businesses and activities. You can find more information on activities and check whether your business activity meets the requirements [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/9256-why-do-i-have-to-provide-business-activity-information).

## How to open a new bunq Business account?

Opening a new business account is quick and easy! Just follow the steps below:

1. Go to the Home tab
2. Tap on + Add accounts
3. Select Business Account and follow the flow!

How do I solve a failed contactless payment?

Hey bunqers  

We understand that experiencing a failed contactless payment can be frustrating. In this topic, we'll list various scenarios, from daily limits to card activation issues, and providing step-by-step solutions to get you back to effortless banking. 

### Exceeded daily limit 
To protect your cards, we've set daily limits for contactless payments of €50 per transaction and €150 for cumulative transactions (when this amount is reached or after 5 contactless payments, you just need to insert your card into the terminal and enter your PIN and the daily counter will reset. When a [country is enabled](https://together.bunq.com/d/2815-can-i-use-my-bunq-card-in-foreign-countries/9) in your card settings, the [local contactless limit](https://together.bunq.com/d/17570-travel-with-ease-contactless-limits-improvements) will apply)

You can find more information about daily limits on this [link](https://together.bunq.com/d/6635)

### We need a PIN for this payment 
If your contactless payment gets declined and you get the error message”PIN not received”, this means we'll need your PIN code for this transaction. Please try to pay by inserting your card in the terminal.

### Card isn't active 
In order to be approved, card payments must be done with an active card. This means that if you've just ordered you card and didn't activate it yet or if you card is temporarily frozen, the payment won't go through. In these cases, you should first [activate your card](https://together.bunq.com/d/3985) before you try to pay again. 

### Will there be an error shown on the POS terminal? ❌

When you pay on a POS terminal, errors with different messages can appear on it if the payment fails. Some of them will state the exact reason why this card payment has failed and others will show a different type of error. This might be caused by the card not being accepted by the terminal so we suggest trying another card of yours or try paying with your Google or Apple Pay.

How does Finn safeguard my privacy?

Hey bunqers 

At bunq, your privacy is sacred. As a bank, we deal with our users’ most trusted and private data, which is why we maintain the strictest privacy standards. Finn is no exception: as your personal AI money assistant, it will only use your data for your benefit. 

In this topic, you can learn more about how specifically Finn uses your data and how bunq makes it impossible to jeopardize the sanctity of your private data. 

### How does Finn use my data?

Finn is designed with a focus on personalized and secure data management. Each data type (transactions, activities, etc) has a separate database where each user's data is stored by us. When you ask Finn a question, it retrieves data from this database in a secure way, ensuring no user’s data gets leaked. 

Finn is specifically engineered to access and utilize this individual database, ensuring a customized and private experience for each user. This means that Finn's interactions and assistance are tailored to the specific needs and data of the individual user, enhancing the user experience while maintaining a high level of data security 

## Does Finn save my data?

Finn doesn’t train on, memorize, or use your data outside the conversations you’ve had with it. In the tech world, it’s called “amnesic”: every time you start a new conversation, Finn starts each conversation with a clean slate, retrieving only the necessary data to provide you with the best possible support. A temporary overview of your data is created to provide you with an answer. This snapshot is created at the moment you initiate the conversation and **won’t be used later for any other purposes**. 

If you choose to proceed with the same chat you've previously engaged with, a portion of the chat's history will be passed. This allows Finn to continue the conversation.

* Further information can be found in our [Personal](https://www.bunq.com/documents/personal) and [Business](https://www.bunq.com/documents/business) Terms & Conditions.

## Where is my data stored?

Your data never leaves our perimeters. We also comply with all applicable regulations when it comes to data protection within Europe (eg. GDPR). Partnering with AWS, ChatGPT from Azure and Google on the latest AI technology, we provide an individual and private model with top security and privacy, meaning that it runs only on our infrastructure in our cloud environment. Additionally, your data is retained for a temporary period of 30 days for the purpose of monitoring any misuse.

No personal data will be used, for purposes other than monitoring misuse, by any third party or individuals.

## Does my data go to third parties like ChatGPT or Gemini?

The data related to your question is processed using models in collaboration with our partners AWS, ChatGPT from Azure, and Google. However, it's important to note that these partners only process the data we send to them. They do not permanently store it and will not use it for their own training purposes. Furthermore, all data processing activities are carried out within the European Union and therefore protected by GDPR.

## Is there any question Finn can’t answer?

Finn won’t respond to any questions about other users, subjects not related to banking, or any language that promotes violence, self-harm, or unfairness. It’s built to maintain a professional manner at all times.

## Can other users access my data?

No. Finn only uses your own data to answer your questions and can’t use it to answer other users’ inquiries. 

## Does Finn provide accurate information?

Finn strives to provide you with the most accurate information possible.  Finn is in its Beta version, meaning it’s continually improving thanks to human input. By using Finn and leaving a thumbs up or thumbs down to each of Finn’s answers, you help Finn improve. 

As any new generative AI technology, Finn can sometimes provide unexpected or inaccurate answers. While the likelihood of errors is low, the potential for diverse and unexpected responses is higher.

What is bunq's BIC/SWIFT code?

Hey bunqers  

At bunq we believe that transferring money should be easy, which is why we do this via a text message or mail.  

Sometimes you still need to transfer money from an international account to a bunq account. In that case you'll need a BIC or Bank Identifier Code. 

This is also referred to as a SWIFT code. With the BIC code, a bank outside of the SEPA region can identify that you're trying to make an international transfer to a bunq account. 

The BIC/SWIFT code for our IBANs are as follows:

- **NL  IBANs = BUNQNL2AXXX**
- **DE  IBANs = BUNQDE82XXX**
- **FR  IBANs = BUNQFRP2XXX**
- **ES  IBANs = BUNQESM2XXX**
- **IE   IBANs = BUNQIE22XXX**
- **UK   IBANs = TCCLGB31XXX**

## What's a BIC/SWIFT code?

The SWIFT system is used to standardize international banking transactions through IBAN. Banks often use the bank identifier code (BIC) instead of the SWIFT code, however, the two are easily interchangeable. 

A BIC/SWIFT code is often needed when sending international transfers. You can find out more about them [here](https://www.investopedia.com/ask/answers/100214/whats-difference-between-iban-and-swift-code.asp).

## Where can I find bunq's BIC/SWIFT code?

You can also conveniently locate our BIC/SWIFT code directly from your Accounts screen if you ever forget it! Follow the steps below to see how:

Per darti la libertà di utilizzare il tuo conto a modo tuo, facciamo di tutto per assicurarci che tu non possa indebitarti anche non offrendo prestiti, crediti o scoperto. In questo modo puoi usare liberamente i tuoi soldi senza dover proecuparti dei tuoi debiti  
Tuttavia, ci sono alcuni casi in cui potresti avere un saldo negativo sul tuo conto bunq. Puoi controllare qui sotto. 

---

## **Ragioni più comuni**

- **Fattura**: la quota mensile d'iscrizione per il tuo account bunq è stata dedotta dal conto di fatturazione ma i fondi non erano sufficienti.
- **Pagamento con carta**: l'importo del pagamento è stato aggiustato [grazie a ZeroFX](https://together.bunq.com/d/4952) o perché il commerciante ha riscosso un importo superiore a quello inizialmente autorizzato.
- **Ricarica Sofort**: non abbiamo ricevuto i soldi per una ricarica SOFORT entro 2 giorni lavorativi. Pertanto, la ricarica Sofort è revocata. [Trovi maggiori informazioni qui](https://together.bunq.com/d/8408-why-was-my-sofort-top-up-reversed).

---

## **La tua situazione**

Puoi facilmente controllare gli ultimi pagamenti nella [nella tua app bunq](https://www.bunq.com/link/events) per capire esattamente quale pagamento ha causato il saldo negativo.

## **Come posso risolvere il saldo negativo per riattivare il mio account bunq?**


- Puoi inviare un bonifico [al tuo IBAN](https://together.bunq.com/d/2880-how-do-i-find-my-iban/5) da un altro conto.
- Puoi anche utilizzare uno degli [altri metodi di ricarica](https://together.bunq.com/d/2933-how-do-i-deposit-money-or-transfer-funds-to-my-account) per aggiungere soldi al tuo conto bunq.

❗️Non appena il pagamento è ricevuto e il saldo negativo è risolto, il tuo conto bunq verrà riattivato immediatamente e potrai utilizzarlo normalmente.

---

## **Cosa succede quando ho un saldo negativo?**

- **Giorno 0**: ti notifichiamo quando accedi all'app bunq e ti chiediamo di risolvere il saldo negativo quando possibile.
- **Giorno 7**: te ne ricordiamo di nuovo al login e ti inviamo anche un promemoria via e-mail.
- **Giorno 14**: inviamo un promemoria nell'app e via e-mail. Le tue carte e le API key vengono temporaneamente disattivate.
- **Giorno 31**: congeliamo il tuo account dopo un mese di debito fino a quando non risolvi il saldo con un deposito.

Who can open a bunq Business account in Germany 

Hey bunqers  

Your safety and well-being are our priority. We have an acceptance policy in place to abide by legal regulations and follow some of our own risk standards as a company.

After you complete the sign-up process in 5 minutes, we'll quickly review your application. We assess each application individually to make sure every company is held to the same standard and fulfils all requirements.

bunq [Easy Savings](https://together.bunq.com/d/48095), [Easy Bank](https://together.bunq.com/d/44002-easy-bank), [Easy Money](https://www.bunq.com/business) and [Easy Green](https://together.bunq.com/d/26307) let you save time, so you can focus on what's truly important: your business. Wondering if you can sign up for a business account? Check out the requirements for opening an account below:

---

## Who can open an account?

Here are the basic conditions you need to meet in order to open a bunq business account:

- You need to have a verified personal account with bunq.
- You as a director cannot be a minor.
- You need to run a legitimate business in Germany 
- You need to be permanently residing in Germany 
- Your business should operate under one of the legal forms currently accepted by bunq. Find the full list [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/9256).
- Your company’s corporate structure and activities should comply with bunq’s requirements. More details on this below.
- Your business entity cannot have more than one account with bunq.
- If your company has multiple trade names (under the same registration on the Chamber of Commerce) - you can effortlessly open a Bank Account with the different names like we explain [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/24341-trade-names-for-your-business-bank-accounts).
- If the various layers of your company are registered as separate legal entities with the Chamber of Commerce (Handelskammer), each one would need its own Business accounts.

Once we confirm the above-mentioned conditions are met, we need to determine whether your business entity is registered with the local Chamber of Commerce or, in specific situations, you are operating on a freelance basis. Depending on that, we require different documents in order to approve your account.

Please also keep in mind that as a bank, we are legally required to store all of our user’s personal information in a secure and protected way. If there is more than one director,  we create personal accounts for each director of the business accounts. ## Company structure

A corporate structure can consist of many layers, depending on its legal form and characteristics.
We cannot accept your company if your legal structure is too complex. We classify this as being outside of our acceptance policy if your company structure is 3+layers. The second layer can consist of 1+ companies or people, but the 3rd layer can only consist of people.

We can only accept a company if the second layer is registered in the same country as the first layer. This means the entire ownership structure can only be in one country.

All companies in the corporate structure have to be one of our accepted legal forms.

The following fall outside of our risk appetite and will not be accepted:

Legal guardianship - what is it and how does it work 

Hey bunqers 

In case you’ve been put under guardianship, this topic will provide you with all the information you need regarding the whole process and how this affects your bunq account.

Be informed that as of 28th December, 2021 we paused the opening of new accounts for people under legal guardianship. If you already have an existing account with us that you activated before the indicated date, this change won’t affect you in any way!

### What's legal guardianship?

A legal guardianship is a measure ruled by court to protect you and your finances. Individuals who may struggle with managing their finances or making reasonable decisions can be assigned a legal guardian. This guardian steps in to help them handle these matters. So let’s see what happens next.

From the moment a court decision for guardianship has been ruled on, you're put under administration and are assigned a public registration.

## How does this affect my bunq account?

#### Step 1. We’ll let you know

When we’re contacted by a legal guardian and receive all the necessary documentation (including the court decision)  from them, we put the relevant account under legal guardianship and inform you right away in the app.

To check your received messages from bunq you can follow these steps:

1. Go to Profile
2. Click on “See More” under Activity
3. Check out the messages sent there

#### Step 2. Debt collection

When we receive a document to block your account(s) because you were declared under legal guardianship by the relevant court, we will block all your liable monetary accounts. The accounts remain blocked until we receive a signed request by the legal guardian appointed by the court to unblock one particular monetary account or all of your monetary accounts.

We comply with a variety of requests which the legal guardian may have keeping in mind the limitations of the applicable law.

If or when the legal guardian requests all available funds in your liable monetary accounts, we’ll transfer these amounts to the dedicated bank account provided by them.

#### Step 3. Unblocking your account

There are two ways to get your account unblocked and released from the guardianship.
1. A court order from the same court that made the initial decision that declares that the legal guardianship has ended. 
2. Your curator can contact us with a request to end the legal guardianship on your account by providing us with the court order.

If your account was requested to be permanently terminated by your legal guardian, we will have to comply with their order as they have the legal rights to do so. .

## When will my account be unblocked?

This depends on the instructions of the legal guardian. To have your account unblocked, please contact your legal guardian.

## My account was blocked on request of my legal guardian. How can I reactivate it?

In this case, your legal guardian asked us to block (or close) your account. If you want to have access to your account again, you have to discuss this with your legal guardian.

If you and your guardian reach an agreement, your legal guardian can reach out to us with the two documents:

- The courter order
- [A filled in Administrator Consent form](http://bunq.com/consent-form-administrator)

## I have another question about legal guardianship. Who do I contact?

We've shared the available details about the guardianship. For more specific advice and assistance, it would be best to contact your respective legal guardian. They'll be able to provide you with more detailed information.

## When will my legal guardianship end?

As soon as a judge ruled on the termination of your legal guardianship. When that happens we must receive the verdict.

With a Joint Savings Account, you can easily save together with your friends, family or partners and receive **1.56%** interest ([2.46% for Dutch users](https://together.bunq.com/d/56274) ) on your shared savings! You can open a Joint Savings Account in just a few taps and, unlike traditional banks, we pay your interest weekly 

### How can I create a Joint Savings Account? 

All you need to do is create a new Joint Savings Account and invite someone to join you. In the bunq app, simply:

1. Go to Home 
2. Click on  +Add
3. Click on  Add Partner
4. Select  Savings Account
5. Select Partner(s)
6. Personalize your account
7. Done! ✅ 

## Who can create a Joint Savings Account? 

This feature is available for Easy Savings, Easy Bank, Easy Money and Easy Green! 

## How does MassInterest work with my Joint Savings Account?

The [MassInterest](https://together.bunq.com/d/8298-what-is-massinterest-and-how-do-i-use-it-to-save/2) for your Joint Savings Account is calculated by dividing the balance of the account by the number of owners, since it's legally equally divided between all owners. The interest earned will be paid out in the individual billing sub-accounts of both owners. Further information about the calculation and payout of MassInterest can be found [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/57042).

**For example**: If you and a friend have a Joint Savings Account with €10.000, you'll each receive interest for €5.000 each (the total balance of your Joint Savings Account divided by two)

Keep in mind that for your individual Personal Account you can receive MassInterest up to €100.000. This limit covers your Personal Savings Account/s as well as your Joint Savings Account/s. 

## How do I close a Joint Savings Account?

In order to close your Joint Savings Account follow these easy steps: 

1. Go to Home 
2. Click on the Joint Savings Account you want to close
3. Withdraw all remaining funds 
4. Once done ➡️ Click on ⚙️ (Settings)
5. Click on Close sub-account 
6. Done ✅ 

Keep in mind that before closing your Joint Savings Account, you should withdraw all remaining funds. Since automatic fund division isn't currently available - you should divide the funds between you and the rest of the owners once you've withdrawn the remaining balance.

## Can I create a Joint Savings Account with a user who doesn't have a bunq account yet?

Want to create a Joint Savings Account with a user who doesn't have a bunq account yet? Simply invite them when you create the Joint Savings Account by choosing their contact (phone number or email) in the contact list as a partner. You'll send an automatic invite to your friend so that they can join bunq, sign up and start saving with you right away! 

## How can I turn a Joint Savings Account into a Joint Account? 

If you experience any difficulties withdrawing funds from your Joint Savings Account or you want faster access to your savings - you can convert one of your Joint Savings Accounts into a regular Joint Account! It's easy - once per calendar month you have the possibility to turn a Joint Savings Accounts into a Joint Account and manage it as explained [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/48586).

How? Simply follow these steps:

Since no credit is used when making the payment, the entire retainer of the deposit will be deducted directly from your account at the time of purchase.

This means you need to have the available funds in your account when paying the deposit. Once the deposit is released, you'll then receive the funds back in your account and you won't risk having a negative balance or falling into debt.

Tap to Pay: Payment events and refunds

Hey bunqers 

This topic explains how to use Tap to Pay on iPhone with bunq. It specifically highlights the process of payment transactions and how to make refunds, offering you a complete understanding of how to make the most of this feature effortlessly!

### Types of payment event statuses

There are three types of payment event statuses:

- Payment payout pending
- Received payment
- Refunded payment

## Payment payout pending

When a card payment is made, it initially goes through a successful authorization process. This means that the amount for the transaction is approved and reserved for the cardholder. In this scenario, the cardholder is the end client who is making a purchase from you.

However, even though the payment has been authorized, it is still in a pending state. This is because the funds have not yet been transferred to your Bank Account. It takes 7 days for the funds to be received successfully and appear in your Bank Account. 

## Received payment
After 7 days, the funds will be successfully received by you and visible in your Bank Account. 
## Refunded payment

You can always refund the desired amount to your client after the payment has been made and a refund was requested. The refund can be partial or full, depending on your agreement. Refunds are instant and when successful, a new refund event is created called “Refund successful”.

## How can I refund a payment?

1. Go to  Home
2. Tap the Bank Account
3. Press on a payment that you want to refund
4. Press “Refund Payment”
5. Choose amount and confirm

## How can I enter a refund event?

1. Go to Home
2. Tap the Bank Account
3. Tap on the payment event that needs to be refunded
4. Tap on “You Refunded”

Birdee is our investment partner that has similar values to us. They have a strong focus on sustainability and want to make meaningful investments accessible to everyone. When you make use of Easy Investments, you’ll be opening an account with Birdee, who'll invest your money on your behalf. Have a look on [their website](https://birdee.co/en-eu/) to learn more about them.

## What are socially responsible investments?
Sustainable and socially responsible investments fulfill social, ethical and environmental criteria. Birdee selects investments that allow creating a better world while providing attractive returns. They do so by taking 3 concrete steps.

- They select the companies, organizations, and countries that have adopted environmentally friendly practices.
- They exclude certain industries, such as arms trade, tobacco and coal industry, porn industry and others that can have a damaging impact on society.

As soon as your money is fully invested, it’s safe from the bankruptcy of either party. In addition to this, your investments (up to €20,000.00) are protected by the [Investor Compensation Scheme](https://ec.europa.eu/info/business-economy-euro/banking-and-finance/consumer-finance-and-payments/retail-financial-services/investor-compensation-schemes_en), meaning that you’ll get investments up to this amount back if something happens to your investments because of operational errors or fraud.

What's Dutch Tax Return and how do I report it?

Hey bunqers 

Every year during April it’s Tax Return season. In this topic you can learn how to prepare for it with your bunq account. 

### What’s a Dutch Tax Return 

If you’re an employee in the Netherlands, your employer takes a specific amount out of your paycheck and gives it to the tax authority (known as de Belastingdienst). 

When you file your tax return in the spring, you provide them with a more accurate insight into your income, assets and expenses of the past year. That way you’ll be able to calculate whether you paid too much or too little in income taxes.

If you’re an entrepreneur, you’ll have to notify the tax authority of your profits and any additional income. The tax return might be more extensive, so an option is to use a third party.

## How do I report it? 

Whether you're an individual or entrepreneur, you can go to mijn.belastingdienst.nl or use the Belastingdienst app and find a pre-filled tax return. You should correct anything that’s incorrect in the pre-filled information, and add information if any is missing.

**Note:** Dutch residents don’t need to report their Personal accounts to the Dutch Tax Authorities. Once you provide us with your BSN number and we enter it in our system, the Tax Authorities will be informed about your names, Tax Identification Number, and IBANs.

What is a P-Konto?

Hey bunqers 

Some of you have asked us whether bunq offers a P-Konto and this topic will give you all the info that you need 

### What is a P-Konto?

Pfändungsschutzkonten (or P-Konto) is a type of account that exists only in Germany. This type of account ensures that money below the legally stipulated minimum living funds can't be seized. For instance, if the minimum living funds in Germany are set at 1300 EUR/month and you have 1400 EUR in your account, only 100 EUR could be seized to fulfill the bailiff's request, even if the garnishment amount is higher. If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us.

## Does bunq offer P-Konto?

Now that we know what P-Konto is and what it is used for, let’s discuss whether bunq offers it.

Even though we support German IBANs, our banking license is from the Netherlands so we do not currently offer P-Kontos. We are legally required to follow instructions from authorities if it concerns a garnishment or account seizure. However, we only process official communication from authorities

In this FAQ you’ll be able to find all the information needed to navigate through the [Easy Investments feature](https://together.bunq.com/d/47183) and learn more about how it all works. Let’s dive into it!

### Who can use Easy investments?

Currently the feature is available for residents in the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, France and Luxembourg. Also due to Birdee’s acceptance policy, you won't be able to open an Easy Investment account if you're a minor, US taxpayer or if your nationality is mentioned below:

Bahamas, Belarus, Botswana, Cambodia, Cuba, Ghana, Iran, North Korea, Pakistan, Panama, South Sudan, Sudan, Syria, Trinidad, Tobago, Ukraine, Venezuela and Yemen

## How are the portfolios constructed

Birdee’s experts have put those together with the help of specialists in this professional sphere. When you create your Easy Investment account, you’ll be asked several questions which will help you find which portfolio suits your investment objective and your risk profile the best.

## What are the risks?

Like any financial investment, Birdee portfolios carry risks. The absolute preservation of your starting capital can’t be guaranteed. 

Birdee monitors the performance of their portfolios on a daily basis and adjusts their composition to keep them in line with the objectives and risk profile you’ve chosen and to ensure the best return. 


## What are the fees?

- You can check them [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/50207)

## What’s an investment objective?

Different objectives imply different risk tolerances and durations and the portfolio we recommend will take those into account. This way you’ll be able to invest with the most suitable portfolio for you. 

## Which companies does Birdee invest in?

Further information on which companies does Birdee invest in can be found in their website [here](https://birdee.co/en-eu/socially-responsible-investments/) and [here](https://birdee.co/en-eu/our-portfolios/).

## How's the performance of my portfolios calculated?

Under your portfolios, you’ll see two key values : Earnings (€) and The yield (%)

To define the performance of its portfolios, Birdee uses the Time-Weighted Return method, which defines the relative performance of a portfolio. It means that the performance is net of the contributions and withdrawals that a user could make. Gains are the amounts of money earned compared to a starting bet.


## How are Value and Performance calculated exactly?

**The Value tab** on the Investments account shows the current value of the portfolio including deposits, withdrawals and movements in the market.

**The Performance tab** shows a graph of the movements in the market.

- **Example:** On Monday you invest 1000€ (Value). On Tuesday, the markets have risen by 10% (Performance), so you have gained 100€ (profit) and your portfolio is now worth 1100€ (Value). You then add 2000€ in the evening and your portfolio is now worth 3100€. On Wednesday, the markets are down by 5%. Your portfolio is now worth 2945€. This translates into a net loss of 55€ on the 3000€ invested in total. However, the performance in % will be 4.5%, i.e. positive: (1+10%)*(1-5%)-1 = 4,5%


## How long does it take for my money to be invested and visible in my Easy Investment account?

Once Sutor Bank (Birdee's partner) receives the funds, it places them in the corresponding ETFs and sends Birdee the information and we apply it in the app right away. This means it may take **up to 5 business days** before the payment appears in your account 

## My Easy Investments account wasn’t approved. Why?

There are two main reasons why your investments account can be not approved by Birdee:

a) _Your ID has expired:_ 
When you create your bunq account, the ID must have been valid, but over time this document may have expired. In this case, you need to provide an updated ID so that you can get approved by Birdee. To do this, reach out to support. They can assist you further by activating an event for you to provide an updated ID in the app.

b) _You’re a politically exposed person:_ 
If you’re considered a politically exposed person, Birdee will request Income information so they can verify your account. You’ll be able to provide this information through the app by contacting the support team - from there, our team will forward your documents to Birdee and finish the verification. 

A politically exposed person is someone who was entrusted with an important public function during the last year and has significant decision-making power.

This could be a chairman of a political party, or the chairman of a state owned corporation. Close family members of such a person are also considered politically exposed. 

## Do I need to provide a TIN?

If you’re from Estonia, Spain, Italy, Iceland, Malta or Poland - you need to provide an additional TIN as per Birdee’s requirement. If it’s needed, you’ll receive an error message and you’ll be able to contact our support to provide this info. 


## What if my returns drop?

No need to worry or panic! Financial markets are always rising or falling. Just like interest rates and prices for everything! 

The important thing to know is that Birdee as our partner makes every effort to rebalance the composition of your portfolio whenever the market requires it 

## How can I withdraw my funds?

Simply follow these easy steps:

1. Go to Home 
2. Select your Easy Investment account
3. Click on  Withdraw 

If you want to withdraw your funds invested in the market, please first make sure to not have any pending deposits

It is possible that your withdrawal was denied because you had pending deposits at the time of your request. Our partner Birdee is at the moment not able to process deposits and withdrawals simultaneously. To withdraw your funds please first make sure you don't have any pending deposits.

## Can I close my account whenever I want?

Yes, you can, just follow these easy steps:

In order to close the account the balance must be €0.00, meaning that no funds should be left in the account.

When you make a withdrawal, you're selling part of your investments. To complete the sell order and get your money from the market, it may take up to 7 to 8 business days of processing time. Keep in mind that during the withdrawal, the value of your investment may change.

Owning a securities account always has tax implications and the fiscal responsibility remains in your hands - it’s up to you to declare to the fiscal authorities all the elements related to the securities you hold.

However, in order to make it easier for you, we’ll send you a yearly summary of your earnings so that you can share them with your tax department right away 

Why do we request your SSN or CLN?

Hey bunqers  

In order to comply with the laws and regulations, we ask you for information on your tax residency within 90 days from signup. If you are a U.S. citizen, we will need some additional information.  

### Wondering why?

According to the Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act (FATCA), a financial institution is obliged to report financial information about U.S. persons (indirectly) to the American Tax Authorities. That includes:

-  U.S. citizens, including those born in the United States, naturalized citizens, and individuals who have obtained U.S. citizenship through their parents
-  US lawful permanent residents (green card holders)
-  Individuals meeting the “substantial presence test” (physically present in the United States for at least 183 days during the current calendar year or a weighted average over three years.)
-  Any U.S. corporation or partnership formed under U.S. state laws.
-  Entities that qualify as U.S. persons based on substantial U.S. ownership or control criteria.
-  Anyone *born in the U.S.* is automatically a *U.S. citizen* by law, and abolishment is only possible following the procedure for renouncement or relinquishment of nationality.  

Due to these special regulations, we are required to ask all U.S. people to provide us with either their *Social Security Number (SSN)*, National ID, and State of residence or a *Certificate of Loss of Nationality (CLN)*. 

---

## Social Security Number

The Social Security Number is a nine-digit number in the format AAA-GG-SSSS, and it helps the U.S. accurately record covered wages or self-employment earnings. The SSN is issued to U.S. citizens, permanent residents and temporary (working) residents, and it is necessary to get a job, to collect Social Security benefits and get some other government services. Once a citizen has been issued an SSN, it is difficult to opt out of the Social Security Program. One option is to revoke US citizenship. 

You can find your SSN on your Social Security Card, tax returns, W2 forms or bank statements. 

---

## Certificate of Loss of Nationality
Citizens who receive a Certificate of Loss of Nationality surrender their United States passport and lose all rights of United States citizenship. You are allowed to prove that you aren't in fact an U.S. person/citizen by providing evidence of renouncement or relinquishment of citizenship and a proof that you have the nationality of another country.

Bank transfers between banks in the [SEPA Region](https://www.ecb.europa.eu/paym/integration/retail/sepa/html/index.en.html) usually take **1 or 2 business days** to arrive at the recipient. 

When you **expect a payment** to arrive from another bank, we'll immediately process it and add it to your balance as soon as we receive the payment from the sending bank. To learn about Instant Payments check out this [page](https://together.bunq.com/d/40305-instant-payments-across-europe-with-tips).

For more details regarding the expected arrival time of your transfer, check the information below 

# **When will I receive my payment?**

You can find estimated arrival times for the following types of payments:


## bunq

- **Payments made between bunq accounts are always instant!**
- This also applies to bunq.me payments made with bunq payment, iDEAL, SOFORT, Bancontact and credit or debit card top up. You can find more information on how to deposit funds to your account [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/2933-how-can-i-add-money-to-my-bunq-account).

## SWIFT

- **May take up to 1 week due to processing times of the other bank.**
- We recommend using Wise instead (as it's faster and cheaper).
- We can only process SWIFT payments into your account when we receive the payment in EURO currency. Make sure that the sending bank takes care of the conversion if the initial payment is made in another currency. Contact the sending bank in case you require help. Learn more about receiving SWIFT payments [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/37766-can-i-receive-a-swift-payment).
- Click [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/2010-can-i-receive-a-payment-on-my-bunq-account-from-outside-the-sepa-region) for more information on receiving payments outside the SEPA region.

## SEPA

- **Instant for banks that participate in Instant Payments with RT1 or TIPS.** You can check out the participants [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/40305).
- **All other banks may take 1-2 working days.**
- If the payment isn't received after 2 full working days, you can contact the sending bank to check on the status of the payment. You can also request the Payment Transaction ID, to allow bunq to locate the payment and process it correctly.

How do offline PIN payments work?



Hey bunqers  

Did you know that you can make offline PIN payments with your bunq card? Yes, indeed - even if the terminal where you're paying is offline (for example on an airplane), you can still make a payment.

### Things to keep in mind

- You can spend up to €250 per day when offline. 
- This currently works with the Mastercard Credit & Debit Cards. It's not supported on Maestro Cards.
- Since the payments will be offline, you won't receive an event in the app immediately, as only your card knows that the payment has been made. This information will come through later when the terminal goes online.
- No need to order a new card in order to activate offline PIN - all applicable bunq cards support it automatically 

## How do I activate offline PIN on my cards?
To enable offline PIN, all you need to do is make a contact payment, i.e., insert your card into a terminal that's online 

## Does an offline terminal support my secondary PIN?
No, secondary PIN will not work with offline terminals, as the PIN validation will only take place on the card itself.

## What happens if the daily limit is met when the offline payment is being processed?
If you've hit your daily limit, and make an offline payment, the offline payment will go through successfully. Only when we receive information about the payment will it contribute to the daily limit.

## What happens if I make an offline payment for a larger amount than my balance?
If the offline payment exceeds the amount of your balance, your account will go into debt. For example, if you have 30€ in your account and make an offline payment for 50€, your account will be 20€ in debt. You can resolve that via the negative balance process [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/24781) ⭐️

Why wasn't my Business account verified?

Hey bunqers 

Your safety and well-being are our priority. That’s why we have an Acceptance Policy in place to abide by legal regulations and follow some of our own risk standards as a bank. 

Some Business accounts may not get verified since they don’t fit our Acceptance Policy. Below, you can see the main reasons we might not verify certain Business accounts: 

## Complex Legal Structure

To ensure optimal user experience, we currently only provide our services to **small and mid-sized businesses with simple corporate structures**. This means that the following structures don’t fit our Acceptance Policy: 

- Foundations (Stichtingen) not managed by a natural person.
- Any legal entity managed by a Stichting.
- Companies with shares owned by companies without shares.
- STAKs (Stichting Administratiekantoor) or companies with a STAK in their ownership structure.
- Companies whose second layer includes one or more companies which are not a Besloten Vennootschap (or a foreign equivalent)
- Stichting Derdengelden
- **For Dutch companies**: Ownership structure which doesn't end with a natural person in Layer 3 (learn more about accepted layering [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/50212)) 
- **For companies outside The Netherlands**: Ownership structure which doesn't end with a natural person in Layer 2 (learn more about accepted layering [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/50212))
- Companies whose layers contain businesses outside our [accepted forms](https://together.bunq.com/d/221)

You can learn more about the structures we accept [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/50212)

## Activities aren’t in line with our risk profile

In order to provide you our services, we should make sure that your business activities are in line with our risk appetite. This means that if your business activities are too risky activities, we’ll have to postpone your verification until further changes in our Acceptance Policy.

* You can learn more about business activities [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/54514)

## You’re not the director of the company 

To keep your money safe, we currently only allow authorized representatives of a business to open an account. When we verify your business, we make sure to double-check all the provided info with the Chamber Of Commerce’s database. 

If a director mismatch is found, we’ll let you know right away!

How does the Pre-Authorization work?

Hey bunqers 

Sometimes when you do a card payment, the payment gets pre-authorized. What does that mean? Read all about it below 

### What is a pre-authorized payment?

The pre-authorization is an acknowledgement to the merchant that the account has sufficient funds and a reservation for a certain amount of money was successful. Therefore, the pre-authorization isn’t a finalized payment - your funds didn’t leave your account yet, but they were reserved for the merchant. Keep in mind that when you do a pre-authorization the amount is still deducted from your Bank Account, so that you can get a real overview of your balance. 

## How does pre-authorization work? 

When you're done with the payment, the merchant should notify bunq within 20 minutes (for Europe) or within 1 hour (US/Canada) in regards to the payment event. 

The authorization is rarely delayed to a couple of hours, where the finalization message isn’t sent to us (especially in credit card based countries). In this case, we adjust the transaction amount only after receiving the request, which can take up to a few days. 

Once the pre-authorization is done, the merchant has to settle the exact amount (a.k.a proceed with the payment and claim the reserved funds from your account). Once they claim the funds - the payment has been successfully done. If the transaction wasn’t complete for a different reason, and the period of 7 or 30 days (depending on the merchant) has passed, you can request a chargeback by following the steps mentioned [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/47826) and we'll reverse the amount.

## What should I do if the payment doesn’t proceed within an hour?

The best advice is to always wait for the payment to get authorized as per the steps explained above. If you have any issues with the payment, make sure to contact the merchant first as explained [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/27036) and request an in-app refund as explained [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/47826) 

What documents do I need to provide to open a Business account? 

Hey bunqers  

To make sure you can open an account with us in 5 minutes, one of the things we need to know is the UBO (ultimate beneficial owner) of your business. We'll need one or more of the following documents as proof:

### What do you need to provide in general?

- [Registration Number](https://together.bunq.com/d/48890)

- [Deed of Incorporation](https://together.bunq.com/d/48891)

- [Written consent for jointly authorized directors](https://together.bunq.com/d/48897)

- [Shareholders registry](https://together.bunq.com/d/48898)

- [Director’s proof of residence](https://together.bunq.com/d/20843)

## Why do we need to know this? 
Long story short... it’s required by law:

We're obliged under the 4th EU Money Laundering Directive (4MLD) to register the name(s), date of birth and ID of the businesses’ Ultimate Beneficial Owner. 

For capital companies an UBO is a natural person who has an interest of more than 25% through direct or indirect ownership, or who controls the entity. For foundations and associations an UBO is a natural person who directly or indirectly holds more than 25% of ownership or is entitled to vote for more than 25% with respect to an amendment of the articles of association, or has control of the entity. For partnerships the UBO is a natural person who directly or indirectly holds more than 25% of the ownership, or is entitled to vote for more than 25% or has control of the partnership. 

At bunq, we identify UBOs as individuals who hold precisely 25% or more ownership in a company. Consequently, we request each person with this level of ownership to share the necessary information about themselves.

For this reason, you’ll need to provide us with some documentation. We’ll ask you to show us the following in order to successfully open an account for your business:
