How are my refunds processed? 彩

Hey bunqers 

Ever wondered how your refund is actually processed? This topic will give you more insights on how every type of refund works and what processes we follow before we credit back your funds 

### How does this work in theory?

Long story short - we cooperate with the merchant and with Mastercard to process it for you. When you request your refund through the app, our relevant department reviews the request for you and assists you during the process. A detailed explanation of the process and how you participate in it can be found below. 

A refund request must always start in the app: it's the fastest way for you to get your money 

## First refund request (request in app)

You can always request a refund for any payment in the app. You can request a refund by following these steps: 

1. Tap on  Home
2. Select desired Bank Account
3. Scroll to the bottom of the screen
4. Tap on Request a Chargeback
5. Select the reason for this refund
6. Submit the requested information
7. Done 

More info on how to request a successful refund [here](https://together.bunq.com/d/47826)

**What happens when you request your first refund?**

- If the payment was unclaimed by the merchant

In cases where the payment was unclaimed by the merchant, the payment remains open. When you request a refund for an open payment, the app starts an automatic counter based on the legal requirements for the refunding timeframe. It’s good to keep in mind that most hotels and car rental companies have a 30-day waiting period. However, in most other cases, the period is 7 days. Once the counter is over - your funds bounce back to your Bank Account right away 

- If the payment was claimed by the merchant 

If the funds were claimed by the merchant, the refund request will be denied. But don’t worry - then you can start another refund request which will be counted as a Chargeback.

## Second refund request (Chargeback)

If the first refund request was denied by the merchant, then you can request a refund again (by following the steps explained above) which will now be considered a chargeback. 

In case of a chargeback process, there are some additional details which are good to know:

- Please give the merchant 7 business days to respond to your refund request.
- Have your goods not arrived? Please give the merchant 30 days to deliver your goods.
- Did the merchant agree to refund you? Please give the merchant at least 15 business days to process the refund.
- Are you requesting a refund for ordered goods or services? Please upload a detailed description of the goods or service (preferably an order confirmation) in the refund request.
- Did you have any communication with the merchant? Please upload screenshots of this in the refund request.
- If you want to request a chargeback, make sure to do so no longer than 120 days after the payment was done. 
- Remember to always request the ARN ID of the refund from the merchant, so that we can locate the potential refund and assist you further.
- A quick summary of the overall timeframe: up to 30 business days (up to 15 business days waiting time for merchant response and 15 days for refund processing).

Once you’ve followed the instructions above, you can start the chargeback process successfully. 

**What happens when you request your second (chargeback) refund?**

Once Mastercard has contacted the merchant and saw both sides of the case, they decide to either cancel or proceed with the refund. 

We’ll update you every step of the way.

**Important note:** The investigation may take between 2 to 6 months in total due to the regulated timeframes for merchant response/further investigation.

3. Wähle “Du brauchst Hilfe mit bei dieser Zahlung?”
4. Wähle “Ich habe problemen mit dieser Zahlung”
5.Wähle OK und Deine Anfrage für die Rückerstattung wurde gesendet

Du erhältst innerhalb von 7 Tagen eine Rückmeldung zu deiner Karten Rückerstattungsanfrage!

Wie das in deiner App aussieht, siehst du hier: 

 [center]
[/center]

- Wenn vorübergehend Geld auf deiner Karte reserviert wurde, z. B. für ein Hotelzimmer oder eine Autovermietung, wird der Betrag nach 30 Tagen automatisch zurückerstattet.

---
## Rückerstattungen für Lastschriften

Wenn du eine Rückerstattung für eine Lastschrift wünscht, beachte bitte Folgendes:

- Es ist notwendig das du der Eigentümer des Kontos bist, um eine Rückerstattung beantragen zu können.
- Es ist notwendig die Rückerstattung innerhalb von 56 Tagen nach Annahme der Lastschrift zu beantragen.
- Dies ist nicht für möglich fur Business-to-Business-Lastschriften

Beachte bitte, der Prozess der Rückerstattung ist nicht für Business2Business Lastschriften verfügbar.

Um eine Rückerstattung für Lastschriften zu beantragen, rufe bitte Deine App auf und folge den folgenden Schritten:

1. Gehe zu Home und klick auf der Konto wo die Zahlung von abgehoben ist. 
2.. Wähle die jeweilige Lastschrift aus (siehe Ereignis mit der Notiz “Lastschrift gezahlt”)
3. Wähle “Rückerstattung beantragen”
4. Bestätige und wähle “Rückerstattung beantragen”

Wie das in deiner App aussieht, siehst du hier: 

[center]
[/center]

## Was kann nicht rückerstattet werden?
Rückerstattungen sind nicht möglich für folgende Arten von Zahlungen:

Weil wir diese Zahlungen gleich verarbeiten, ist es technisch nicht möglich für diese Arten von Zahlungen Rückerstattungen anzufordern, da die Systeme dieser Zahlungsarten uns keine Möglichkeit bieten deine Zahlung zurückzufordern.

Why is an Identity document requested from me when I reactivate my account?


Hey bunqers  

For the safety of your bunq account and funds, we will sometimes require an extra precautionary measure. This extra step is to ensure that access is only given to the appropriate individual. In this case we will need you to upload an Identity Document which you can send directly to us. 

### How do I reactivate my account?

1. Forgot Security code 
2. Enter the email address or phone number of the account you want to reset the security code for
3. Tap on **Try another way** 
4. Verify Identity 
5. Select a document and tap on **Access my camera** 
6. Fill in Document Number and Place of Birth 
7. Tap on **Next** 

## Photo requirements

Keep in mind that **we ONLY accept direct photos** of the Identity document*. Make sure the document provided:

- Is still valid;
- Belongs to you;
- Is not blurry, cropped or scanned;
- Has a front and back side;
- Is original.

**We DON’T accept documents which are copies, print-screens or scanned**  

---

## Reactivation of your Business account is also super easy

You need to be:

- Director/Shareholder or Authorised Representative of the Business Account (be present in the Chambers of Commerce excerpt  and the documents of the company);
- Upload your Identity Document.

The submitted documents are reviewed manually. We aim to review all documents within 12 hours, however in some cases it might take longer. 

---

If you are still locked out of the app or you forgot your security code, you can reset it in the app. Check out [this page](https://together.bunq.com/d/3980-help-im-locked-out-of-the-app-how-do-i-reset-my-security-code) for more information.
